Text:
I am having a hard time at school, because my classmates tease me cuz im small.
But then i found scenetime, and since i started supporting them, i have grown faster. I am now about twice as tall as the cafeteria vending machine and noone dares to tease me anymore.
support scenetime to grow faster!! Guaranteed result.

Some kind of 2d-3d conversion. Maybe just as simple as timeshifting left eye 1 frame from right eye. Awful 3d in other words.  :(
And yes: Red/cyan glasses are needed but the 2d-version looks ten times better than this. Why did someone even bother?
Crossposting just for knowledge.
